programme.desc: Kejana’s aunt Rose moved in with her and her man Dicoy. Dicoy ended up cheating with Rose! Can Ruben get Selena to leave his best friend Scott? Eddie had a fling with transsexual Chloe, but then his girlfriend’s father found out!

programme.desc: Andre and Champaign’s online relationship took off, but she must admit that she’s actually a he! Shane will marry Michelle, but he’s been fulfilling his fantasy with a Dominatrix! Brandy’s wild job now involves her sister’s boyfriend!

programme.sub-title: I'm Cheating With Your Dad And Sister!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Nick is here to tell his soon to be wife Ashley that he's been cheating on her with two different women! Plus, Shea is here and worried sick that her husband Adam may have had a little too much fun on a recent trip the couple took together.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kenny lived with sisters Lora and Misty, who are also his lovers but he treats them like servants. Later, Jerry confronts Kenny with the results of the 9 positive paternity tests, but Kenny says he only cares about 2 of his 9 children.

programme.desc: Nikki, Courtney, and Samantha all want to have a three-way lesbian marriage! Then Jonathan's engaged to two different women, but after they learn they're both being playing, he's going to have to make a choice.
